Uses of Interface
org.mockito.verification.VerificationAfterDelay

  • Packages that use VerificationAfterDelay 
    Package Description
    org.mockito
    Mockito is a mock library for java - see Mockito class for usage.
    org.mockito.verification
    Verification related classes.

    • Uses of VerificationAfterDelay in org.mockito

      Methods in org.mockito that return VerificationAfterDelay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VerificationAfterDelay Mockito.after(java.time.Duration delay)
      Verification will be triggered after given amount of time, allowing testing of async code.
      static VerificationAfterDelay Mockito.after(long millis)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Mockito.after(Duration) instead.
